title: Purrrrrrrfect! Cats and dogs welcome at Park Place Northville
posting_body: ['Park Place Northville', '43001 Northville Place Dr', 'Northville, MI 48167', 'A wonderful home in Northville is waiting for you!', 'We currently have a gorgeous 1 bedroom 1 bathroom renting for $1345 - $1692 per month.', 'This unit comes with 773 sq ft.', 'YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', 'Start your new chapter at Park Place!', 'Our luxury apartments for rent in Northville have everything you need!', 'From spacious floor plans to high-end amenities that are sure to help you live in style and luxury!', 'Click through our photo gallery and see why you should call Park Place your new home in Northville, Michigan!', 'show contact info', 'Community Highlights:', '● 24 Hour Fitness Gym', '● Business Center', '● Clubhouse', '● Laundry Facilities', '● On-Site Maintenance', '● Sundeck', '● Swimming Pool', '● Tennis Court', '● Volleyball Court', '● Wifi-Cafe', '● Center Sidewalks Throughout', '● Close to Downtown Northville', '● Concierge', '● House Plant Watering Service', '● Lush Landscaping', '● Luxury Building', '● Minutes from shopping, dining, and entertainment', '● Package Receiving', '● Pets Allowed', '● Smoke-Free', 'Unit Highlights:', '● Built-in Microwave', '● Cathedral Ceilings On Second Floor', '● Dishwasher', '● Frost Free Refrigerator', '● Heating', '● High Speed Internet Access', '● Private Entrances (Select Units)', '● Range', '● Spacious Master Bedroom', '● Walk-In Closets', 'Contact:', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Leasing Options:', '4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'We are extremely pet-friendly, however, dogs are only allowed in Buildings 1 through 10!', 'Also, we even have "While Away" pet care!', 'Pet rent is $30 per pet.', 'Management:', 'JRK Property Holdings', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'B331DC26A65142C9']
